price: Destruí en el pasado pueblos que había a su alrededor, después de haberles enviado todo tipo de signos para que recapacitaran.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مَا حَوۡلَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡقُرَىٰ وَصَرَّفۡنَا ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَرۡجِعُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ahlaknā mā ḥawlakum mina al-qurā waṣarrafnā al-āyāti laʿallahum yarjiʿūna
